column4: --- When I try the following command with mplayer:    mplayer -dump mms://*****         It returns a "stream not seekable" error.
are you sure it's an error?  I tried it yesterday, saw that message, but it was still dumping.
in the current directory.  do a "ls -altr" and it's the last file shown
mplayer will exit when it's finished dumping.  then you can rename the dump file to have the correct extension
it is a .asf file, do you know of a way to convert to mp3
mencoder should be able to do that I think
I've never tried using mencoder, sorry.
